FQ 
Hello please post anon... Can i take pepto bismol while pregnant?? Im 6 months by the way!! Thanks!! 
RPJulie

One time I bought tampons, sanitary pads, a home pregnancy test, Midol & pepto bismol. I was shopping for a friend (the Not sure one) and myself (the Definitely pregnant one) but the gentleman who rang us up looked very, very confused.

Me: I cant take Pepto Bismol. You cant take Pepto when youre pregnant. 
My dad: Why? Will it turn the baby pink? Wait. No. (Turns to my sister, who is gay) THATS WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU! Pepto Bismol turned you GAY!

My dad: First sign of a sniffle, youre all getting Buckleys 
Me: Can I even take Buckleys?
My dad: Sure you can. It might make youre stomach upset. 
Me: my stomach is already upset (Im pregnant and feeling morning sickness)
My dad: take some Pepto Bismol.
///CONTINUED\\\
S/O to those 2 random girls at the beach five years ago who gave my hella pregnant self Pepto Bismol. Yall saved a life with that pink goo.
Nausea, upset, diarrhea & Sleeping all day dont mean Im pregnant! I just need some pepto-bismol ! So I want my little cousin/sister to stop coming for me Im not pregnant its not my time yet
I sometimes drink a lot of Pepto Bismol to offset my stomach but then I remember Im just pregnant.

Me: granny my stomach hurt, you got some pepto bismol or sumn?
Her: nah but we got some Canada Dry
Me: alright
Her: Mark what yo stomach doing hurting? You aint got nobody pregnant did you?
Me (very confused):..........NO
